Lamia:

Lamia heard the maximals move away ans she slowly went towards the =
exit



From: Sandy 
Sent: Friday, March 12, 2010 10:08 PM
To: nbwrpg@yahoo=
groups.com 
Subject: Re: The Old Maximal Base/Unicron's come back


  
Afte=
r getting Legacy's message, Quickstride and Rat Trap look at each other. Qu=
ickstride shrugs.

"Oooops, okaaaay, so I might have messed up a little bit=
."

Rat Trap does the same.

"So did I, don't feel bad. Okay Legacy we read=
 ya, thanks for the word up... I wonder why they're lettn' the snake go?"

=
Quickstride shrugs again.

"I dunno. Strange isn't it?"

They both get into=
 robot mode and continue toward the CR chamber where Tucson had first exite=
d to begin his quest to finding Rodimus. Rat Trap spots familliar battery f=
luid.

"Look at this, battery fluid, I know where that came from. Wheels...=
 He must've been here a while ago... He kinda did mention somethn' about Ke=
nzo... " 

They make their room Kenzo's med bay, as they follow the tiny sp=
atters of battery fluid that lead them right to where Tucson had been just =
moments ago.

Quickstride spots Kenzo and Depthcharge with ears forward.

"=
Wow, it's been a long time since we last saw ya sir. Welcome back."

They b=
oth salute Depthcharge.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Preston Carroll <su=
percyclonus@...> wrote:
>
> The large purple, black and silver dragon that =
was Marauder continued to
> float silently and majestically above the old M=
aximal base, like a predator
> waiting patiently for the object of its desi=
re to reveal itself.
> 
> "Well." Marauder transmitted to the the Maximals,=
 "Where is she?" he voice
> was becoming more and more aggressive as time p=
assed as was his posture.
> 
> Legacy paused as he scanned the base. Severa=
l new Maximal signatures
> suddenly sprang to life on his screen. Swiftly h=
e opened communication lines
> to Rat trap and Quickstride, "Greetings." Le=
gacy's typically cold voice
> intoned across the airwaves, "There is a mini=
on in your vicinity, it has
> been given permission to leave."
> 
> Meanwhi=
le as Legacy spoke, Marauder moved over towards the opening that
> Quckstri=
de and rat Trap had just used to enter the base, as if something had
> attr=
acted his attention there.
> 
> (TAG)
>
